original_text: Better is the poor that walketh in his uprightness, than he that is perverse in his ways, though he be rich.
korean_text: 가난하여도 성실하게 행하는 자는 부유하면서 굽게 행하는 자보다 나으니라

sentences.original_text: Better is the poor that walketh in his uprightness
sentences.korean_translation: 정직하게 행하는 가난한 자가 더 낫다

sentences.original_text: than he that is perverse in his ways
